secTitle: Sow A Seed Today. You Can Choose To Support Us In Any Of Our Projects.

dataList.courseDesc: This project involves the construction of any of our proposed faculties. The Benefactor can fund this project partially or fully.
You can fund a partial or full scholarship award to our brilliant or indigent students to support their education.
A benefactor can make a substantial contribution to the salary and other costs of a Named Professorial Chair.
We welcome benefactors to support us in upgrading our existing Sport Centre to meet our desired taste.
You can support us to upgrade any of our existing teaching or laboratory facilities of your choice.
Our proposed AI Centre is one of our dreams to position Summit as a top destination for AI in Africa.
